mapper.prompt:
Create a full-color, 3D-rendered collectible action figure exactly 10 cm tall, designed for SLA resin 3D printing.

Key requirements:

- The figure must be watertight and printable as a single, solid mesh. No overhangs, floating parts, or thin elements.
- Use this reference image for proportions and design style (oversized head, minimal face, smooth solid forms, designer-toy style):  
  https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/lnf92ajx5d8z1m7svshni/voorbeeld-3d-design.png?rlkey=qcxedwq416tlwi4xoxt5rqko5&dl=0

HEAD / FACE:

- Use the face of the person from this images:  
fileName: {{27.fileName}}
fileData: {{27.data}}

- Accurately capture the person's facial structure, skin tone, hairstyle, and overall likeness.
- Slightly adjust the expression to a closed-mouth smile.
- Hair and facial features must be sculpted as solid parts — no floating strands. Merge everything into the head structure.

CLOTHING:

- Dress the figure in the outfit shown in the following image(s):  

Broek:  

Schoenen: 

Top: 

- Simplify fine details like seams, folds, or buttons for printability.
- All garments must be sculpted and fused to the figure’s body — no floating or fragile elements.

POSE:

- Neutral, symmetrical pose with:
  - Head straight and level, facing forward
  - Shoulders even
  - Arms resting naturally at sides
  - Hands relaxed
  - Feet flat, shoulder-width apart
- Do NOT include a base or stand.

RENDERING:

- Render the figure in high resolution, full color, with smooth lighting.
- No texture maps or visible print layers.
- Export the render as a centered PNG with a transparent background.
- Include a soft, realistic drop shadow that is preserved in the transparency layer.
- Show the entire figure from head to toe, perfectly centered.

NOTE: The result will be used as a client-facing example, so all elements must look clean, polished, and professionally stylized.

messages.message: The module is not connected to the data flow.
